  • Paranoia
  • Stubborn
  • Susceptible

Mixed

With the Stubborn add on, Eraser can’t erase your role, Cleanser can't cleanse you, Bandit can't steal from you and Monarch can't knight you.
Additionally, you can’t gain any new addons from the merchant.

  • Max
    • Set the Maximum amount of Stubborns that can be in a match
  • Spawn Chance
    • Set the percentage players have of getting Stubborn
  • can have Stubborn
    • : can become this role
    • : cannot become this role
  • can have Stubborn
    • : can become this role
    • : cannot become this role
  • can have Stubborn
    • : can become this role
    • : cannot become this role
  • can become Stubborn
    • : can become this role
    • : cannot become this role

Idea: Dailyhare & Coding: ryuk
